decks.notes: The deck utilizes the combo potential of Underworld Breach and Grinding Station to continuously mill cards from the library and generate a win condition through Thassa's Oracle. Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Mishra's Bauble provide card advantage and graveyard recursion, while Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer generates additional resources. Urza's Saga helps find key artifacts like Grinding Station, while disruptive elements like Teferi, Time Raveler and Lightning Bolt control the board. The mana base is optimized for fetching with Flooded Strand and Scalding Tarn to ensure consistency in casting spells.

This deck focuses on utilizing the Underworld Breach combo to quickly loop through cards in the graveyard and generate infinite mana and spells. Key cards such as Mishra's Bauble, Grinding Station, and Emry, Lurker of the Loch help to fuel the combo and draw into essential pieces. The deck also includes Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Galvanic Blast for additional value and disruption. The goal is to establish a strong board presence while setting up the combo to overwhelm the opponent with a flurry of spells and creatures.

The deck focuses on utilizing Underworld Breach to cast spells from the graveyard, while also utilizing a combination of cheap interaction and card selection to control the game. The deck aims to efficiently disrupt the opponent's game plan while setting up its own combo of generating mana and casting spells for value. The creatures in the deck provide additional pressure and card advantage, allowing the deck to adapt to different situations and maintain a proactive game plan. The mana base is streamlined to support the deck's strategy and enable it to consistently execute its game plan.

The deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly and efficiently to play powerful land creatures like Primeval Titan and Cultivator of Colossus. Amulet of Vigor allows for extra land drops and boosts mana production, while cards like Explore and Dryad of the Ilysian Grove help fix mana and accelerate the game plan. The inclusion of utility lands like Sunhome, Fortress of the Legion and Boseiju, Who Endures provide additional benefits for the deck's strategy. Overall, the deck aims to assemble the Amulet Titan combo as quickly as possible to overwhelm opponents with big creatures and combat tricks.

This deck focuses on utilizing the Underworld Breach combo to loop through cards from the graveyard and generate a large amount of mana to cast spells like Grapeshot for a lethal finish. It also includes powerful cards like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Emry, Lurker of the Loch to generate value and create additional combo opportunities. The deck aims to quickly assemble its combo pieces while disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Unholy Heat and Lightning Bolt. The inclusion of Urza's Saga and Mishra's Bauble help to generate additional value and card advantage throughout the game.

This Jund Aggro deck focuses on using efficient creatures and removal spells to apply pressure on the opponent while disrupting their game plan with hand disruption spells. The deck also utilizes the powerful Urza's Saga land to tutor for key artifacts and the planeswalker Wrenn and Six to get repeated value from land drops. The inclusion of Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion allows for additional ramp and mana fixing in the deck, providing a versatile option for a wide range of situations.

This UR Aggro deck focuses on using efficient spells like Lightning Bolt and Counterspell to control the board while applying pressure with aggressive creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Dragon's Rage Channeler. The deck also features disruptive cards like Spell Pierce and Mishra's Bauble to disrupt the opponent's game plan. By combining quick threats with countermagic, this deck aims to close out games quickly by overwhelming the opponent with a mix of damage and disruption. The mana base is designed to support the game plan with a mix of fetch lands and fast lands for consistency.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize fast and efficient spells like Lightning Bolt and Spell Pierce to control the board early on, while also using cards like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Dragon's Rage Channeler to apply pressure and close out the game quickly. Underworld Breach allows for card advantage and recursion, while Expressive Iteration helps with card selection. The deck also includes some graveyard hate with Ledger Shredder, and Mishra's Bauble to provide additional card advantage. The mana base is optimized to allow for both red and blue spells to be cast efficiently.
